search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Small Improvements (small-improvements.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Small Improvements can be found at: [https://www.small-improvements.com/pricing/](https://www.small-improvements.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Small Improvements starts at $3 a month, per user.
--------------------------------------------------

Get started with a 30 day free trial or get in touch with our team.

### Launch

Jumpstart and automate a lean performance review process.

$3

per user/month, billed annually

No minimum pricing

What’s included

*   Essential Performance Reviews
    
*   Praise
    
*   Company Directory
    
*   HRIS integrations
    
*   Google Sign-in
    

[Start 30 day free trial](https://www.small-improvements.com/register)

Recommended

### Grow

Everything you need to build a culture of continuous feedback and growth.

$6

per user/month, billed annually

No minimum pricing

What’s included

*   Everything in Launch
    

*   360º & Anytime Feedback
    
*   Essential Objectives
    
*   1:1 Meetings
    
*   Pulse Surveys
    
*   Slack integration
    

[Start 30 day free trial](https://www.small-improvements.com/register)

Volume Discounts available

### Elevate

Our all-inclusive solution for engagement and performance at scale.

$9

per user/month, billed annually

Minimum pricing applies

What’s included

*   Everything in Grow
    

*   All features
    
*   All Integrations
    
*   All Customizations
    
*   Advanced Analytics
    

[Start 30 day free trial](https://www.small-improvements.com/register)

[Compare our packages](https://www.small-improvements.com/pricing/feature-list/)

###### What our customers say?

HR teams love Small Improvements  

-----------------------------------

[![Image 4: Users love Small Improvements on G2](blob:http://localhost/9f67afbbfc378de8e273414c8d3922eb)](https://www.g2.com/products/small-improvements/reviews?utm_source=rewards-badge "Users love Small Improvements on G2")[![Image 5: Small Improvements is a leader in Performance Management on G2](blob:http://localhost/9f67afbbfc378de8e273414c8d3922eb)](https://www.g2.com/products/small-improvements/reviews?utm_source=rewards-badge "Small Improvements is a leader in Performance Management on G2")

![Image 7](blob:http://localhost/9f67afbbfc378de8e273414c8d3922eb)

![Image 8](https://www.small-improvements.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/rebeca-dominguez.jpeg)

[![Image 9: Users love Small Improvements on G2](blob:http://localhost/9f67afbbfc378de8e273414c8d3922eb)](https://www.g2.com/products/small-improvements/reviews?utm_source=rewards-badge "Users love Small Improvements on G2")[![Image 10: Small Improvements is a leader in Performance Management on G2](blob:http://localhost/9f67afbbfc378de8e273414c8d3922eb)](https://www.g2.com/products/small-improvements/reviews?utm_source=rewards-badge "Small Improvements is a leader in Performance Management on G2")

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

##### How long can I evaluate for?

The free trial period starts the day you sign up and lasts for 30 days.

##### How do I transition to a paid account?

If you are satisfied with the trial, you can add all remaining staff members using the same company account. Since the initial sample users do not count toward your licenses, you can also keep the sample users for testing.

##### How does the minimum pricing work?

The minimum subscription pricing on our Elevate plan is equal to purchasing the tool for 50 users. This would be $5,400 on our annual plan.

##### Do you offer discounts?

A core part of our model is affordable pricing for everyone and our normal rate reflects that. We do offer a volume discount for accounts with 200 or more active users on our Elevate plan.

##### Does Small Improvements provide training?

Based on experience, people rarely struggle with the product itself. But if you need some pointers on how to educate your team on giving feedback, setting effective objectives, or conducting 1:1s, please get in touch. We’re happy to help.

##### Can anyone become a customer?

We value our customers greatly and strive to ensure their satisfaction. However, we have certain criteria that must be met for a business to become a client. We do not currently work with any armed forces and reserve the right to refuse entry to any business whose model or practices do not align with our ethical standards.

We carefully assess each case individually and provide quotes accordingly to avoid any surprises. Although it is rare, we may decline potential clients who do not meet our values. Reach out to our sales team early to understand if this applies to you.

Unlock your company’s full potential
------------------------------------

![Image 16](blob:http://localhost/9f67afbbfc378de8e273414c8d3922eb)
